pr_title: Add aliases during CGMES import for missing IDs

timeline.message:
Update CGMES Comparison to compare aliases

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Update CGMES Comparison to compare aliases

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Use aliases in CGMES

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

All tap changers are kept in memory, not only one

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Small correction for default behaviour of tapChangersForPowerTransformer(String)

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

addAlias TOPOLOGICAL_NODES for boundary nodes (dangling line)

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

# Conflicts:
#	cgmes/cgmes-conversion/src/main/java/com/powsybl/cgmes/conversion/elements/ACLineSegmentConversion.java

Add the prefix "CGMES." in alias type to check the type will be unique to CGMES import

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Update of StateVariablesAdder for more complete SV file

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Update CGMES Comparison to compare aliases

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Correct sonarcloud smell

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

CgmesModel.terminalForEquipment(String, int) is now deprecated + javadoc

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

add aliases on merged line resulting from line-switch configuration at boundary

Signed-off-by: Luma <zamarrenolm@aia.es>

timeline.bodyText: Missing addAliases for merged line when line-switch configuration is seen at boundary ?
timeline.author: zamarrenolm
